msbt.message: I'm gonna have to do some restraint exercises so I don't eat too fast. It's gonna be real intense.Keeping your willpower in good shape is just as important as your muscles, !

Some folks will spend Turkey Day at home cooking, and that's cool, but I wanna see the pro-chef's technique.What's his whisks-per-minute? What brand of protein powder does he use? How many pan-lifts can he do?I gotta know these things! I just gotta, !
Eating right is a key part of healthy muscle growth, .That's why it's critical I sample each and every dish. Maybe more than once, even. Because muscle growth!
I asked if I could help carry food out, but I guess our chef doesn't have the ingredients he needs yet.You gotta help him! I'm so hungry right now, it feels like my abs are crunching ME, !
Franklin's a pro. He knows EXACTLY which ingredients he's missing.It'll be hard to find that stuff around here, but lots of folks are at home cooking today. Maybe they can help!
That smells so good, I can barely hold myself back. OK, I gotta flex some restraint. Here goes HNNGH!
Wow, that smells good. Mega good. I-don't-wanna-wait-anymore good. Almost-worth-skipping-leg-day good!
Look at all those awesome dishes! Also, wow! That table's getting a serious workout, !
What should I eat first Hmm This is harder than deciding whether to jog or do squats first, .
All the food looks AMAZING! Just looking at it is making my eyes bulge more than my biceps, !
I'm so glad I came hungry. This food is the best thing to happen to my stomach since sit-ups were invented!
I gotta be careful how much I eat. It's almost time for my next workout, . But what a feast!
Every single bite tastes like winning the big game. I honestly had no idea non-protein-shake food was so good!
Have you seen this feast? Y'know, I think I can give up stomach crunches for food crunches for ONE day.
I can't get enough of those bold and muscular flavors! It's like the food is working out my taste buds!
The food is so good, I almost forgot about muscles for a minute. Almost.
My taste buds were NOT prepared for how good was.Oh! I heard it was you with the play of the game, getting us . Way to go!
I could almost hear a packed stadium cheering me on as I was eating . It was THAT good.Did I hear it was you that got for it? Nice!
My taste buds were NOT prepared for how good was.Oh! I heard it was you with the play of the game, getting us the manila clams. Way to go!
I could almost hear a packed stadium cheering me on as I was eating . It was THAT good.Did I hear it was you that got the manila clams for it? Nice!
Since it's Turkey Day, I thought I'd try cooking up some top-tier pro athlete chow, .I did lots of research and came up with a meal that could turn anyone into champion.
Just 'cause I'm here cooking Turkey Day chow doesn't mean that I'm not also working out, . Lifting cast iron pans is serious arm training, so I'm making something that uses as many of those as I can!
I know I can't compete with a fancy pro chef's cooking, but just wait. My food's gonna have some real muscle!
Time for my visualization exercises to pay off, !I finally came up with a good high- protein, low-calorie dish. Now to figure out how to make it

The thing isif I really wanna amp this dish up, it's gonna need a few dashes of .I wish I'd known that last week. My is dashed outWhat would you say to an ingredient exchange? Wanna sprint out and get me ?

Butif I really want this dish to come out on top, it's gonna need a splash of .Barbells! Where am I supposed to What's with the grin? You have , don't you?Would you be up for a trade? I'll give you some of my ingredients for your . Sound good?
Let's trade!
Sorry, no.
Aww, so close!Well, if you change your mind or decide you have more than you need, let me know, !
My food is super strongbut it's not quite swole yet. I think it still needs a sprinkling of .
Here you go!
Sorry, I can't help you.
I wanna take this meal to the next level, but I'm gonna need a dribble of for that
Here you go!
Sorry, I can't help you.
Oh Well, if you decide you can do without, just let me know.I'll trade you some stuff that'll really bulk up your chow, !
Oh! Solid feint. I thought I'd just scored what I needed. Guess not.Well, if something changes and you feel up for a trade, I've got some awesome ingredients you can draft!
Going with a different play call, huh? That's fineI guess.
Whoa! Awesome! Except, uhthat's not .Hey, if you don't have any you can pass to me, I get it. But I'm open if you ever change your mind!
Whoa! Seriously? You're a star player, !Alright, why don't you take myum Oh! My . Here!
Now my food's definitely gonna make the playoffs, !Oh, hey! I was studying the tape and I spotted an idea for your cooking playbook. You ready for this?

Clam chowder is easily one of the star players in the Turkey Day lineup, and amping it up is a cinch!All you gotta do is field a scallop! It's that easy! I bet you thought I was gonna say something about mussels.

Clams are like the midfielders of any clam chowder—gotta have 'em. But you need the other positions too!If you really wanna power-up your clam chowder, try adding one of the bigger shellfish. It can be the goalie!
A good pumpkin pie is a surefire way to make the crowd go wild.But to really pack the stands, you gotta use all four pumpkin colors!

You know how every team needs a deep roster? Well, that's as true for pumpkin pie as it is for football.Build your lineup with as many kinds of pumpkin as you can, and you'll make that pumpkin pie a winner!
It's hard to make a bad gratin, but making a great one? You need a real game-changer!Great gratin means muscular flavors. And few flavors can bench more weight than Dungeness crab!
When it comes to gratin, some sink and some swim. And sea critters spend their lives swimming, soI bet if you added some crab to your gratin, it'd conquer the swim circuit in no time!
You gotta get serious about cooking if you want your fish meunière to take home the gold.That means using a serious fish. And no fish has a more serious name than the barred knifejaw.
A good fish meunière should be like a good locker-room speech—simple and inspiring.But you gotta throw in at least a little complexity, like a striped fish or a six-syllable word. It's all strategy!
You're a real playmaker! The way you passed me those ingredients was totally clutch, !You know, if you hadn't helped me out, I probably would've just made a protein shake and called it a day.
I owe you big for that all-star ingredient you got me. Way to come through, !Now I've got an awesome meal I can put on my highlight reel, and it's all thanks to you, .
After a marathon cooking session, I finally crossed the finish line.And now my place kinda smells funny likelike actual good food. I'm not used to that,
Whew! All that cooking was working muscles I didn't even know I had. Maybe I oughta do it more often!
I hope everyone likes my cooking. You'll never guess what I did to make it extra special, .I dumped an entire tub of protein powder into it so folks could get ridiculously, deliciously swole!
Tur-key Day! Tur-key Day! Cook like you mean it, it's Tur-key Day!Alright, I want a good, clean meal. Everyone go to your kitchen and let's cook, !
A buff body needs buff food, which is why I'm gonna season everything with protein powder, !
I didn't wanna have to pick between cooking and lifting, so all my cooking gear is cast iron. It's super heavy!
Turkey Day was so good! We had everyone huddled up in the plaza, having fun and laughing.Stuff like that is why I just love it here. Go Team !

I'm kinda sad now that Turkey Day is over. It's like that empty feeling you get after the big game is over.The field is empty, the crowd is gone, and the only thing left is an echo of when something awesome happened.But something awesome DID happen. And that something was Turkey Day!
Franklin knows his recipes like I know my free weights. That was incredible, !
Turkey Day was so much fun. I even got to test my gourmet cooking skills, which was, uhinteresting. I still can't figure out what I did wrong. Did I use too much protein powderor not enough?
I can't think of any way Turkey Day could've gone better, .I had a great time hanging out and eating tasty food with everyone. I'm as happy as a six-pack on core day!
Cooking for Turkey Day seems like a really tough workout, .You work your arms lifting pans, and your legs with all the standing. Plus it's all one long cardio workout too!
Watching Franklin cook was just like watching a world-champion pro at their peak.Except, you know, nobody's ever tried to cook a giant feast and do at the same time. Yet!
